title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV26-106)
description: On February 10, 2026, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: Simcenter Femap, Simcenter Nastran  versions prior to V2512
Siveillance Video Management Servers  multiple models and versions
Siemens NX  versions prior to V2512
Desigo CC V6, V7 and V8  multiple versions
SENTRON Powermanager V6, V7 and V8  multiple versions
SIPORT Desktop Client Application  all versions
Solid Edge  versions prior to  V226.00 Update 03
SINEC NMS User Management Component (UMC)  versions prior to V2.15.2.1
Polarion V2404  versions prior to V2404.5
Polarion V2410  versions prior to V2410.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
